newsitem.title: USA: BEC Group stake held by Marvin Schwartz.
newsitem.headline: BEC Group stake held by Marvin Schwartz.

text.p: Marvin Schwartz, general partner of the New York limited partnership Neuberger & Berman, said Friday he holds a 7.72 percent stake in BEC Group Inc or 1,362,000 common shares.

In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, Schwartz said his latest transactions include the purchase of 768,600 common shares between November 18 and January 16 at prices ranging from $4.0174 to $4.75 per share.
Schwartz said he acquired the stake for investment purposes.
BEC, based in Rye, New York, is a sunglass and optical technology company.
